name: Voteless
description: The Voteless are mutated Super Earth citizens, warped by the Illuminate into mindless melee soldiers with pale skin and glowing blue eyes.\nWhile individually weak, they are resilient and lunge quickly, overwhelming Helldivers in large swarms.\nGas weapons and anti-infantry stratagems are highly effective against their hordes.

name: Overseer
description: Overseers are ancient Illuminate warriors wielding energy staves for both high-damage ranged attacks and devastating melee sweeps.\nThey deploy energy shields under fire but remain vulnerable to area-of-effect attacks and shots targeting their legs or helmet.\nOverseers excel at close combat, using their staves to knock down and overwhelm Helldivers.

name: Harvester
description: Harvesters are large, mechanical tripods armed with a deadly sweeping laser and deployable shields.\nTheir shields regenerate over time, but destroying the crest above their eye disables them permanently.\nSlow and vulnerable to flanking, Harvesters can be taken down with precise shots to their eye or legs.

name: Watcher
description: Watchers are floating Illuminate scouts that call in reinforcements upon spotting threats, emitting flares to signal Warp Ships.\nThey fire low-damage Arc lightning when engaged and explode on impact after destruction, posing a final danger to nearby Helldivers.\nPrecision shots to their main body can eliminate them quickly.
